label: 藤原令明
本: The Pursuit of Loneliness: Chinese and Japanese Nature Poetry in Medieval Japan, ca. 1050-1150 . Franz Steiner Verlag Stuttgart . 1995
説明文: (dates unknown, active early twelfth century). Brother of Chikamitsu and Shigeaki. Kanshi in Chūyū ki burui shihai kanshishū 中右記部類紙背漢詩集 (4). [漢詩、周光、茂明]
